markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Read Disaster](/Feats.aspx?ID=1496) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Exploration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=66" />
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=319" />
<trait label="Prediction" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=132" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 80 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Time Mage](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=191) (Level 10)

</column>

---

You spend 10 minutes and open yourself to the divine mysteries of the world, peering into the most sinister portents of the future. You gain the effects of [_augury_](/Spells.aspx?ID=15), except you learn only about the dangers ahead; any results of “weal” are instead “nothing,” and results of “weal and woe” are instead “woe.” If you are legendary in [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13), you take only 1 minute to Read Disaster.
name: Read Disaster

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 8" pfs="Standard" > Read Disaster Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 80 2.0 Archetype Time Mage (Level 10) --- You spend 10 minutes and open yourself to the divine mysteries of the world, peering into the most sinister portents of the future. You gain the effects of augury , except you learn only about the dangers ahead; any results of “weal” are instead “nothing,” and results of “weal and woe” are instead “woe.” If you are legendary in Religion, you take only 1 minute to Read Disaster.
